title: How Did TikTok Star Noah Beck Get So Famous?
description: The TikTok star got lucky during the pandemic. But can he use social media fame to court Hollywood?
dc:creator: Max Berlinger
media:credit: Maggie Shannon for The New York Times
media:description: Noah Beck was a college freshman training to be a soccer player when TikTok came knocking. With more than 34 million followers today, he is one of the platformâ€™s biggest stars.
